metadata.name: Blood Realm, Vol. 2: Shadowed Kingdom
metadata.description: During General Gorn's quest for the Black Heart, a team of Saytrian warriors are sent on a treacherous mission across the lands of Mhordrin and to the Hollow Fortress. There they must uncover the whereabouts of a missing Saytrian battalion... and a secret more terrifying than their darkest nightmares.
